title: The Prince Warriors and the Swords of Rhema
description: In this third book of The Prince Warriors trilogy, the Prince Warriors finally receive their last piece of armorâ€”the swords they were promised when they began their adventure in the unseen realm of Ahoratos. And none too soon, for they must face the ultimate enemy, one who is gathering his Forgers and creating unthinkable new evil to stop the Prince Warriors from winning any battle ever again.
author: Priscilla Shirer
